articles.title: Tecno Phantom V Fold in Pics: First look at the cheapest foldable smartphone in India - HT Tech
articles.description: Tecno recently entered the foldable smartphone market with the launch of Tecno Phantom V Fold, its first ever foldable smartphone in India. It is finally here, and we take a first look at this latest foldable smartphone from Tecno.
